alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 04 at 7:54AM MST until January 05 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...East Sweetwater County, South Lincoln County, Rock Springs and Green River and Flaming Gorge. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until noon MST today. For the High Wind Watch, from late tonight through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County
